name: Balls Brick Breaker
description:
The classic color brick game, for you to relax and swipe to break the color boxes! Don't worry about the balls, just wipe out as many bricks on the screen as possible!

How to Play：
- Swipe to shoot balls to break the bricks
- The ball flies to wherever you touched
- Each ball hit will reduce the brick's durability, When durability reduce to 0, brick breaks
- Clear the stages by removing bricks on the board.
- When the bricks reach the bottom line, game is over

Challenges：
- Use fewer balls to wipe out all bricks, get the perfect score!
- Find best positions and angles to hit every brick
- Break the bricks and never let them hit the bottom

More Feature:
- Free download to play
- Endless gameplay to relax your brain
- Unlock various types of balls and features
- Easy to play, simplest game design
- No WiFi required, enjoy it anywhere anytime, underground subway, classroom, meetings ...
- Tablet device supported
- Addictive minimalist game for all ages

Enjoy this best killing time game, relax your mind!
